Text.p: The intergalactic hyperdrive is obtainable only from planets at Tech level 10 or higher, and can only be used once. The intergalatic hyperdrive is engaged by pressing the button shown above.

[b]IGH specification:[/b] Although a number of manufacturers have supported a whole range of IGH motors, it is recommended you remain loyal to Xexor/Hikan who provide the standard hyperspace transit drives.
